contents.text: Thank you for calling Portrait Displays, the East Bay's premier provider of customized display software for computer and display manufacturers.
For new product inquiries and pricing, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our sales team.

navigationGoals: Get pricing and feature details for your newest customized display software.
I’d like pricing details and package options for your new display software so I can order licenses for my small business.
Get detailed pricing and specs for bulk licensing of Portrait Displays’ multi-monitor calibration software.
I’d like to get pricing information for your customized display software.
I’d like details on pricing and student discounts for your new display calibration software.

contents.text: For OEM partnerships and licensing, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our OEM partnerships team.

navigationGoals: Discuss OEM licensing terms and partnership options for integrating your display solution.
I want to explore an OEM licensing agreement to bundle your display management software into our rugged tablet lineup.
Discuss OEM integration and licensing terms to embed the display management SDK into my hardware.
I need details on how to license your software as an OEM partner for my business.
I want to discuss licensing terms for embedding your display software into my lab’s custom instrumentation.

contents.text: For setup and installation assistance, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our installation support team.

navigationGoals: Arrange quick setup and installation assistance for our recently purchased display software.
I need step-by-step help installing your display customization software on my desktop systems.
Walk me through installing the calibration SDK on Ubuntu and configuring color profiles.
I’m having trouble installing the display software and need step-by-step help.
I need help installing and configuring your display rotation tool on my Linux workstation.

contents.text: Please hold while we connect you to our troubleshooting specialists.

navigationGoals: Troubleshoot a display software error I'm facing with your support team.
My display software keeps freezing when I switch orientations; I need help troubleshooting the issue.
Help me troubleshoot a calibration service crash with error code 0xC0000005 in the display logs.
My display software isn’t working right and I’d like help diagnosing the problem.
I’m experiencing flicker on my dual-monitor portrait setup and need troubleshooting assistance.
